Replace.Text: +50% when executing city projects [ICON_Production] Productivity[NEWLINE] Provides a special area - Oven, which will unlock a series of special items [NEWLINE] (For details, please check in Encyclopedia-Resources-Strategy-Mother Pepper )

Mineral resources provide additional +1 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture [NEWLINE] and strategic resources belonging to mineral resources unlock the corresponding technology and get several copies for free every round

Initially unlocked, the construction cost is low, and it can provide a lot of [ICON_Production] productivity for the city[NEWLINE] After completion, it will provide +3 [ICON_RESOURCE_PEPPER_MOM] Pepper Mom every round to perform special projects [NEWLINE] At the same time, the city can ignore [ICON_Citizen] after the area is completed Population builds an additional district.
Replace the theater, the cost is half of the normal area, and provide +1 charm for adjacent cells by[NEWLINE] (limited to one execution per item)
floating life listening to the wind

During the screening, a small amount of [ICON_Culture] cultural output will be provided. After the screening, [ICON_DISTRICT_NIAN_FILM] film studios in all cities will have +3 [ICON_Culture] culture; the city that completed the project will have +6 [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_Culture] cultural output +10% and get a souvenir

During the screening, a small amount of [ICON_Culture] cultural output will be provided. After the screening, a [ICON_GreatWriter] great writer, a [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist and a [ICON_GreatMusician] great musician will be obtained; all cities will get [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points +50 %, at the same time your civilization sponsors [ICON_GreatPerson] great people need to spend 20% less [ICON_Gold] and get a souvenir

During the screening, a large amount of [ICON_Gold] gold coins will be produced, and after the screening, melee units will be provided with the effect of ignoring the debuffs of river [ICON_Movement] and hilly [ICON_Movement] and +5 [ICON_Strength] attack power; spy cap +5, And the spy can be promoted to [ICON_Promotion] as an agent at the beginning, and get souvenirs at the same time

During the screening, a small amount of [ICON_Science] technology output will be provided. After the screening, [ICON_DISTRICT_NIAN_FILM] film studios in all cities will have +6 [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Science] technology. Tech gets [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka Boost, +20% [ICON_Science] Tech for cities with a population of 10 [ICON_Citizen] and 4 [ICON_District] specialization districts, and gets a souvenir
